title: Most embarrassing sports blooper ever
text:
Hockey announcer makes one of the most embarrassing bloopers ever The Daily Telegraph Hockey announcer makes one of the most embarrassing bloopers ever The Daily Telegraph Hockey commentator Bob Miller, cringes as he realises what he’s just said. 
THESE are the gaffes that announcers have nightmares about. 
Bob Miller, the long-time play by play man for NHL side the Los Angeles Kings, has been in the business since the early 70s and is never anything but a consummate pro. 
But when the Kings took on the Carolina Hurricanes, Miller committed one of the most embarrassing gaffes of all time. 
Judging by the look on his face, he knows exactly what he’s done as well. Bob Miller's face at the end of recounting his "8 inches of his shaft in his hands" blooper is the best part https://t.co/KvSvP3poTj — The Cauldron (@TheCauldron) October 26, 2015 
Miller was trying to describe the scene after a goalie had broken his stick during the game. 
For the record, the Kings won 3-0. Other Stories
